pages.page:
Level 01
The Red Hat
Reading Series

I see a red hat.
It is on the bed.
The cat is on the mat.

The cat sees the hat.
The cat jumps on the bed.
The hat is flat now!

A dog runs in.
The dog sees the cat. The
dog barks, "Woof, woof!"

You did it! You read the whole
book.
Let’s keep reading!
